slogan.US: Pioneering the Future of Technology and Innovation in the United States
slogan.GB: Pioneering the Future of Technology and Innovation in the United Kingdom
slogan.default: Pioneering the Future of Technology and Innovation

about.title: About TFOT Labs
about.history: Founded in 2014, TFOT Labs has been at the forefront of technological advancement, blending cutting-edge research with practical applications to shape tomorrow's world.

mission.US: Our mission is to innovate sustainably, empowering communities in the United States through transformative technologies that address the challenges of the future.
mission.GB: Our mission is to innovate sustainably, empowering communities in the United Kingdom through transformative technologies that address the challenges of the future.
mission.default: Our mission is to innovate sustainably, empowering global communities through transformative technologies that address the challenges of the future.

values: Innovation: Pushing boundaries with bold ideas.
Integrity: Upholding ethical standards in all endeavors.
Collaboration: Fostering partnerships for collective success.

franchise.title: Franchise Opportunities
franchise.info: Join the TFOT Labs network and bring futuristic innovation to your region. Our franchise model offers comprehensive support, training, and resources for success.

careers.title: Careers at TFOT Labs
careers.intro: Join our innovative team and shape the future of technology. We are seeking passionate professionals to drive our mission forward.

vacancies.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable web applications using modern frameworks like React and Node.js.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews.
Optimize application performance and ensure code quality.

vacancies.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Analyze complex datasets to extract actionable insights using Python, R, and machine learning tools.
Build predictive models to support business decisions and product development.
Visualize data trends and present findings to stakeholders.
Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models into production.

vacancies.title: Product Manager
responsibilities: Define product vision and roadmap in collaboration with engineering, design, and business teams.
Gather and prioritize requirements from customers and stakeholders.
Oversee product lifecycle from ideation to launch and iteration.
Track key metrics and conduct A/B testing to optimize user experience.

vacancies.title: UX/UI Designer
responsibilities: Design intuitive user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups using tools like Figma or Adobe XD.
Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
Collaborate with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately.

vacancies.title: Marketing Specialist
responsibilities: Develop and execute marketing campaigns across digital channels to promote TFOT Labs products.
Analyze campaign performance and optimize for ROI using tools like Google Analytics.
Create compelling content for social media, email, and website.
Manage brand partnerships and events to increase visibility.

vacancies.title: HR Manager
responsibilities: Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and employee relations processes.
Develop talent acquisition strategies and manage performance reviews.
Foster a positive company culture through training and engagement programs.
Ensure compliance with labor laws and HR best practices.

vacancies.title: DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Docker.
Manage cloud infrastructure on AWS or Azure for scalability and reliability.
Implement monitoring and alerting systems to ensure system health.
Automate deployment processes and collaborate with development teams.

vacancies.title: AI Researcher
responsibilities: Conduct research on advanced AI techniques, including machine learning and natural language processing.
Develop prototypes and proof-of-concepts for new AI applications.
Publish findings and contribute to open-source projects.
Collaborate with product teams to integrate research into real-world solutions.

vacancies.title: Project Manager
responsibilities: Lead cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time, within scope, and budget.
Define project milestones, track progress, and mitigate risks.
Facilitate communication between stakeholders and team members.
Use tools like Jira or Asana to manage workflows and reporting.
